column4: Any one useing an 8800 video card? if so what drivers are you useing? I cant seem to get any type of performace out of my 8800GT.
using an 8800 here - using the restricted-manager drivers worked fine for me.
a lot of that depends on the apps running also. I see similer effect, and even under windows it seems i rarely max out both.
what version of windows you running?
thats weird, i always see my vista install maxing out both cores or balancing the load between the cores in vista.
like see them both running at 60%.
there are no settings or any thing in Ubuntu to check for dual core CPU's?
if the kernel fines them it will use them. IF you are using the 386 kernel - i belive it will NOT use them. you need the -generic kernel
at least thats how the  hardy release it working for me.  (which i am  beta testign right now)
yea it sees the system as haveing 2 cores.
just tryin to make sure i am getting max performance out of my computer :)
even when reencodeing videos.. i rarely seem to max out my 2 cpus.
theres always other bottlenecks it seems.
yea, just wish i could get my video card to work correctly now, so that i can game on this PC.
